get.description: Search globally across the GitLab instance.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope to search in

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search query

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter by state. Issues and merge requests are supported; it is ignored for other scopes.

parameters.name: confidential
parameters.description: Filter by confidentiality. Issues scope is supported; it is ignored for other scopes.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Allowed values are created_at only. If this is not set, the results are either sorted by created_at in descending order for basic search, or by the most relevant documents when using advanced search.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Allowed values are asc or desc only. If this is not set, the results are either sorted by created_at in descending order for basic search, or by the most relevant documents when using advanced search.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope to search in

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search query

parameters.name: sort

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope to search in

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search query

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: The name of a repository branch or tag to search on. The projectâ€™s default branch is used by default. This is only applicable for scopes: commits, blobs, and wiki_blobs.
